control_attributes.control_description: The organization a. Maintains temperature and humidity levels within the facility where the information system resides at [Assignment: organization-defined acceptable levels]; andb. Monitors temperature and humidity levels [Assignment: organization-defined frequency].
control_attributes.Control_description: The organization positions information system components within the facility to minimize potential damage from [Assignment: organization-defined physical and environmental hazards] and to minimize the opportunity for unauthorized access.

Control Statement: The organization a. Maintains temperature and humidity levels within the facility where the information system resides at [Assignment: organization-defined acceptable levels]; andb. Monitors temperature and humidity levels [Assignment: organization-defined frequency].
